title: Geektext Bookstore
description: A single page application that allows users to browse through a catalogue of books. Users can also create an account and manage their personal information.

title: Data Science Workflow Manager
description: Collaborated with team members, FIU Air Lab and Farelogix to create a data science application that tackles model integration and customized web-based visualization to allow end-users to explore model generated data interactively.

title: Streaming App
description: A web application design to function like Netflix. Users can browse tv shows and movies, and toggle trailers for the movies

title: Chat App
description: A web application designed to function similar to Slack. Users are required to log in before accessing chat. The Application features a live chat, the ability to traverse different channels and toggle light and dark themes

title: Ecommerce App
description: A web application designed to function similar to Amazon. Users can browse and purchase products. Users are required to log in before checkout
